alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 9:21PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cass and northwestern Crow Wing Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 920 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms near Pine River, near Hackensack, and near Walker moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walker, Pine River, Hackensack, Backus, Federal Dam, Leech Lake, Woman Lake, Wilkinson, Ten Mile Lake, Chickamaw Beach, Pheasant Lake, Lake Ada, Whipholt, Brevik, Pontoria, Webb Lake, Big Portage Lake, and Lower Hay Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; South Cass
